It can be made of different materials like stainless steel, titanium, aluminum, or even wooden material.
You can attach different things to your keychain like your keys, USB device, flashlight and other useful items.
It can have a safety keyhole or an emergency kit, which can be essential for car travel.
The keychain can be customized with different logos, designs or initials of friends and family.
It can be made of a strong material like metal or plastic, which will not break easily.
